Colleges.about: A Brief Summary about Erbil Administrative Technical Institute â Erbil
Colleges.about_text: Erbil Administrative Technical Institute was officially established on February 14, 1987 in the capital of the Kurdistan Region , Like all Kurdistan institutes and colleges, it was affiliated to the Council of Higher Education under the Council of Ministers. They consisted of the following departments: (Health and Society, Hospitalization, Anesthesia, Electricity, Mechanics, Law Administration).In 1988-1989, the first graduation course was held and several other departments were opened. Until 2003-2004, the number of departments of the institute became 16 departments that belonged to the fields of (mediate-administration, technology and agriculture).As a result of this expansion, each of these fields became independent institutes and included the following departments, which means that the, the medical departments became medical technical institute, and the agricultural departments became Agricultural Technical Institute, and Technology Departments became the Technology Institute, and the administrative departments become Administrative Technical Institute.Erbil Administrative Technical Institute now consists of 10 departments: Law Administration, Accounting, Management Information System, Information and Library, Tourism foundation Â Administrations, Business Management , Marketing, translation techniques department. The main objective of the institute is to train and prepare skilled experts in the scientific departments of the institute, who will become the owners of certificates (Diploma degree) in order to further rebuild Kurdistan and improve the scientific level of administrative institutions in the country.
Colleges.name: Prof. Dr. Kayhan Zrar Ghafoor
Colleges.lab_text: Our Medical Lab offers cutting-edge facilities and advanced equipment, providing students with hands-on experience in clinical and biomedical research. Dedicated to innovation, the lab supports various research projects and practical training sessions. Expert faculty and staff ensure a comprehensive learning environment, fostering the development of future healthcare professionals.

International.international_strategy_text: Explore the wide range of international programs and partnerships we offer. Our goal is to foster global collaboration and provide enriching opportunities for our students and staff.
International.strategy_text: To achieve internationalisation, EPU focuses on teaching, research and innovation, community engagement, and globalisation, thereby taking an advisory role in raising awareness of the significance of internationalisation, student and staff mobility and highquality international research. A crucial part in developing its internationalisation will be self-enhancement through collaboration with local and international organisations in order to play an important role in advancing knowledge and solving problems of the community. Overall, the internationalisation strategy of the university focuses on five core goals
International.exchange_programs_text: This unit focuses on promoting cross-cultural understanding and cooperation. Its responsibilities include organizing cultural events, facilitating student exchange, summer training, and internship program. In addition to fostering partnerships with international institutions and communities. The cultural relations unit works to enhance intercultural communication and collaboration, aiming to build strong relationships and mutual understanding between individuals from different cultural backgrounds The mission of this section is to support the academic staff or the alumni to study abroad through participation in quality programs in a wide range of disciplines. Also to enable the faculty staff to participate in training and scientific researches. Furthermore, to arrange all issues which are related to participation of faculty and staff members in conferences, workshops and training courses. Moreover, the purpose of this section is to develop the ability of the academic staff of the university internationally, by increasing the awareness and understanding and enrich curricula on every campus of the university, as well as to expand educational opportunities abroad for students from diverse backgrounds. As the most effective and dramatic experience by which students and staff can achieve international and intercultural learning, study abroad will contribute significantly to careers in all fields of specialization and should be an integral part of an education at Erbil Polytechnic University
